summary: Completed comprehensive testing of SmartTasks MVP - authentication flows, task CRUD operations, AI analysis integration, and admin settings. Backend APIs 100% functional, frontend 90% functional with minor UI issues.

ui_bugs.issue: Settings link not consistently visible in dashboard header during automated testing

design_issues.issue: Console warnings about missing Description or aria-describedby for DialogContent components

passed_tests: Landing page loads with Spanish content
User registration with email verification (testing mode)
Email verification with password setup and auto-login
AI task analysis (single and bulk operations)
Report generation with statistics and filtering
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor UI improvements: Fix settings link visibility consistency and add missing aria-describedby attributes to dialog components for better accessibility
